attributes.action: Reverse any decision to build Chinese ( or new European) Nuclear Power stations.
attributes.additional_details:
There are many articles from respected sources giving the details on the internet.
Examples: 
http://www.theguardian.com/world/2015/may/25/china-nuclear-power-plants-expansion-he-zuoxiu - "He Zuoxiu, a leading Chinese scientist, says the country is not investing enough in safety controls after lifting of post-Fukushima disaster reactor ban"
and
http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/business-34149392

This is a potential future environmental disaster waiting to happen.
Reverse the decision.
attributes.background:
New Nuclear power stations should not be built in the UK by foreign firms. Concerns of the true 'full life' costs, and especially the safety of these designs MUST be paramount.
We cannot evacuate Essex, Kent and most of east London if something does go wrong, as they effectively did in chernobyl
